thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A little taste of Europe
thread.title_full: A little taste of Europe - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chickadee60
title: A little taste of Europe
text: It felt like a cute hotel in Europe. The gal at the front desk was the most helpful person, showing me my room and pointing out the features. She also gave me some awesome restaurant advice. It's a perfect location if you want to be near all of the theatres. I did pick a cheaper room above the bar which indeed is a bit noisy, but I can't deduct from my review since I was warned. The bed was comfortable so I was able to sleep well. I would not hesitate to stay again!!
